attributes.additional_details:
I believe that it has become too easy to change the country just by sitting at a computer and clicking around.
I know this petition is almost the definition of irony, by if this petition succeeds it would cancel out the point to have this petition, but I believe it would make the united kingdom better, by saving councillors and members of parliament time by removing unnecessary and usually uninformed petitions from having to be debated.
attributes.background:
As you may know, recently this website has had a huge petition for a second referendum, causing more and more people to create non-serious petitions, such as:
-4th referendum to shutdown the 2nd and 3rd u referendums
-battle of hasting rematch
-penalty shootout rematch
And many more.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament could choose to shut down this website, but they do not have the power to close all petitions websites.
